Occupation History:
Gisèle Evelyne Bühler is a 67 year old retired Publisher from Switzerland. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Gisèle Evelyne Bühler's first role was as a Journalist at SRF Schweizer Radio und Fernsehen, where she worked diligently from 1981 to 1984 to establish a strong reputation.
In 1985, she moved to SRF Schweizer Radio und Fernsehen to work as a Editor, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Her tenure as a Publisher at NZZ Mediengruppe from 1988 till retirement was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
